snippet.title: Wanwan Aijou Monogatari (Casio Loopy, 1995) -- FEMICOM.org
snippet.description:
"Wanwan Aijou Monogatari" (わんわん愛情物語) is a visual novel adventure for the 32-bit Casio Loopy game console. The title, roughly translated, is "Woof-Woof Love Story" and was developed by Alfa System. "Wanwan Aijou Monogatari" was a pack-in game in some retail Casio Loopy sets.

You can find more information about this and other retro games, electronics, and software featuring feminine design elements at FEMICOM.org.
